translations: v．翻新，改进：对某物进行修复、改进或重新安排，使其更有效或更具吸引力。

sentences.sentence: Some Suggestions for optimization and technical revamps were made, too.
sentences.translation: 提出了进一步优化的建议和技术改造设想。

sentences.sentence: Theres give-and-take in Jacks own love life when Avery revamps his apartment.
sentences.translation: 有付出和得到自己的爱情生活时，埃弗里推行的杰克他的公寓。

sentences.sentence: To date KBR has licensed more than 120 grassroots FCC units throughout the world including 13 grassroots units and more than 120 revamps since just 1990.
sentences.translation: 到目前为止授权KBR超过120基层催化裂化单位遍布世界各地包括13基层单位120余只自1990修整以来年。
